title: Healthy Garden Salad
ingredients: ['Dressing', '5 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons grapeseed oil', '5 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 limes, juiced', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'Salad', '1 (480g) bag frozen shelled green soya beans', '500g (1 1/4 lbs) frozen sweetcorn kernels', '300g (11oz) cherry tomatoes, quartered', '4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained']
